title: Premier Insurance Offer
summary: The slide promotes an insurance plan underwritten by the United States Fire Insurance Company, offering Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance. This plan is exclusively available to NCE Members.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans
summary: The slide outlines various insurance plans with specific daily benefit amounts for different hospital services, ranging from the 100 Plan to the 1000+ Plan. It includes details on daily hospital confinement, emergency room visits, outpatient surgery, physician office visits, and more. The slide also covers group accident benefits like accidental death and hospital admission benefits, with varying payouts depending on the plan level. Available states for these plans are listed at the bottom.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefits Overview
summary: This slide outlines the benefits available under the Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity plan. It covers Daily Inpatient Hospital Confinement Benefit, Intensive Care/Coronary Care Unit Benefit, and benefits for Surgery and Anesthesia. Eligibility is based on specific conditions, including a hospital stay for a covered illness or injury. Several exclusions apply, such as surgeries not performed in a hospital or those that are experimental. The slide also details the conditions under which benefits are paid, including the timing and duration of hospital stays.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Description of Benefits
summary: The slide outlines the benefits included in the Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity plan. It covers Daily Outpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Laboratory Test Benefit, and Daily Outpatient Laboratory Test Benefit. The Daily Outpatient Surgery Benefit provides coverage for necessary surgeries in a hospital or physician's office, excluding cosmetic surgeries. The Daily Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Laboratory Test Benefit covers these tests when performed on a covered person in a hospital setting. The Daily Outpatient Laboratory Test Benefit applies to tests performed in a hospital outpatient or physician's office when not confined to a hospital. The slide also notes exclusions related to fertility treatments and cosmetic surgeries.

title: Group Accident Insurance Benefits Overview
summary: The slide outlines the benefits available under a group accident policy, specifically focusing on Hospital Confinement, Daily Intensive Care/Coronary Care, Emergency Room, and Daily Recovery benefits. It details the conditions under which these benefits are applicable, such as the necessity of hospital or ICU admission due to injuries from a covered accident, the payment amounts, and the durations of coverage. Additionally, it specifies the exclusion of sickness, disease, or bodily infirmity from these benefits.

title: Group Accident Description of Benefits
summary: This document outlines various benefits available under a Group Accident Insurance policy. It includes descriptions for Daily Inpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Inpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Imaging Benefits, Daily Outpatient Surgery Benefit, Daily Outpatient Diagnostic Radiology, X-ray and Imaging Benefit, Daily Inpatient Laboratory Test Benefit, and Daily Outpatient Laboratory Test Benefit. Each section details the conditions and coverage specifics, such as what constitutes a 'Surgery' or 'Radiology Test,' hospital confinement requirements, and eligible reimbursements.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines the specific conditions and scenarios under which the Limited Fixed Indemnity insurance plan does not provide coverage. Key exclusions include injuries from war, illegal activities, and participation in riots or protests. Coverage is also denied for treatments related to mental health, substance abuse, experimental procedures, and self-inflicted injuries. Additionally, the plan does not cover services provided by certain non-recognized practitioners or those for which no charge would be made in the absence of insurance. Other exclusions involve care related to cosmetic surgery, custodial care, and treatments covered under other insurance policies. Special attention is given to exclusions related to pregnancy and abortion services, unless in specific circumstances.

title: Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity Benefit Exclusions
summary: The slide outlines exclusions for group hospital fixed indemnity benefits, including treatments for blood disorders, routine vision care, and injuries while under the influence of alcohol or drugs. Specific exclusions include procedures like cosmetic surgeries, participation in professional sports, and experimental treatments. Additionally, there are pre-existing conditions limitations, where coverage is not provided for conditions diagnosed or treated within a specific period before the start of coverage. The slide emphasizes that the insurance is limited and not comprehensive, suggesting alternatives for more extensive medical coverage.

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
summary: The slide outlines exclusions for coverage under a Group Accident Benefit policy. Key exclusions include losses resulting from war, military service, participation in riots, injuries while under the influence of alcohol or drugs, and injuries covered by Workers’ Compensation. Other exclusions cover self-inflicted injuries, criminal acts, and specific activities like aviation (except as a fare-paying passenger).

title: Group Accident Benefit Exclusions
summary: This slide outlines specific exclusions for group accident benefits. It lists scenarios where expenses will not be covered, such as treatment from non-licensed professionals, treatment unrelated to covered injuries, and travel in certain vehicles. It includes exclusions for injuries sustained while committing illegal acts, participating in sports professionally, or during war. It also highlights the lack of coverage for certain conditions, self-inflicted injuries, and non-accidental injuries. Additionally, it specifies that benefits are not payable for losses due to sickness and stresses that the policy is limited, with specific terms and conditions detailed in the certificate.

title: Termination of Insurance Policies
summary: This slide outlines the conditions and procedures related to the termination of insurance policies. It covers policy termination dates, including automatic termination on the policy expiration date or due to non-payment after a grace period. Insured persons' termination details include eligibility loss, age limits, and military service changes. Dependent coverage termination occurs due to age, marriage, or policyholder’s status change. It also includes details about premium refunds and responsibilities of the association regarding membership benefits, with a specific premium schedule provided.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits
summary: The slide provides information about NCE, which is a national association offering benefits and services to small and medium-sized businesses. It highlights the Premier Plan Insured Benefits, mainly focusing on accident-only plans instead of traditional health insurance. The slide also explains the Membership Packet and ID Cards process and outlines the insurance eligibility requirements, including Group Hospital Fixed Indemnity and Group Accident Insurance Plans.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits
summary: The slide details the benefits of NCE Association Membership, highlighting that there are no waiting periods or pre-existing condition limitations for benefits like medical, dental, vision, pharmacy discount card, and emergency travel assistance. The GapAfford Plus program offers savings on medical expenses, covering deductibles, coinsurance, and more, without lifetime maximums or provider restrictions. Additionally, First Health Network provides discounts for members who choose network providers, offering savings on medical visits and services with no limit on the number of visits. A call to action encourages finding First Health network providers online.

title: NCE Association Membership Benefits - GapAfford Plus
summary: The slide details various benefits available to members of the NCE Association through the GapAfford Plus program. It includes discounts on prescription drugs, access to telemedicine and a 24/7 nurse helpline, and savings on medical supplies and equipment. Additional services encompass pet care, chiropractic care, hearing and vision services, and a health information line. Members also receive assistance with medical bill negotiations and laboratory savings. The program offers discounts on vitamins, supplements, and physical therapy.
